DataElement.preferredName: Anticoagulant Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates whether a patient receives anticoagulant medication that meets the criteria for participation in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Anticoagulant Agent Administration Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Agents that prevent blood clotting. Naturally occurring agents in the blood are included only when they are used as drugs._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Agents that prevent blood clotting. Naturally occurring agents in the blood are included only when they are used as drugs.:The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

Concepts.definition: Any agent capable of preventing blood clot formation.
The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering of something to another, such as administration of a medicine.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 8/3/2015 Corrections made to VD in order to restore to original format: removed C49486 as rep term and replaced with C49797; restored long name and definition per Dianne Reeves/tt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Use of any anticoagulation me
ReferenceDocuments.description: Use of any anticoagulation medications, such as warfarin or Coumadin
